layout.title: Custom Website Development | Fast, SEO-Optimized Websites
layout.description: Professional custom website development with lightning-fast performance, SEO optimization, mobile responsiveness, and unlimited edits. We manage everything for you.

hero.title: The Website Your Thai Massage Business Deserves
hero.text: Your website is often the first impression customers get. Make it count. We create professional, fast-loading websites built specifically for Thai massage businesses. Everything managed for you, from launch to forever.
hero.imageAlt: Professional web developer working on custom website

services.title: More Than Pretty. Built To Bring You Bookings.
services.text: A website means nothing if it doesn't bring you customers. That's why we focus on speed, mobile experience, and conversion—making sure every visitor can easily find and book you.

items.title: Stand Out From Your Competitors
items.text: Customers judge your business in seconds. A professional, modern website builds instant trust and credibility. Stand out from competitors still using outdated sites or just Facebook pages.

items.title: Google Loves Our Websites. Customers Too.
items.text: Our websites score 95+ on Google PageSpeed—meaning customers get instant results and Google ranks you higher. Fast sites keep visitors engaged and convert more browsers into bookings. Simple.

items.title: Always Updated. Always Secure. Always Working.
items.text: No technical skills needed. We handle hosting, security updates, backups, and maintenance forever. Your website stays fast, secure, and current—while you focus on running your business.

reviews.title: What Our Clients Say About Their Websites

items.text: Our new website is incredibly fast and looks amazing on all devices. We've seen a 40% increase in enquiries since launching. The team manages everything for us - it's completely hassle-free. Best investment we've made for our business.
items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.title: Owner, Thai Wellness Spa

items.text: Finally ranking on the first page of Google! The website is beautiful, super fast, and I can request unlimited changes whenever I need them. They truly manage everything - I don't have to think about the technical stuff at all.
items.name: James Martinez
items.title: Director, Serenity Massage Clinic

features.imageAlt: Professional web development team at work
features.boxText: Trusted by 100+ Businesses Across the UK
features.title: Why Businesses Choose Our Custom Website Development
features.text: We don't just build websites - we create powerful digital assets that drive real business results. From blazing-fast performance to top search rankings, we deliver websites that work as hard as you do.

items.title: Super-Fast Loading Speed
items.text: Your website will load in under 2 seconds, guaranteed. Fast websites rank better and convert more visitors into customers.

items.title: Mobile-Optimized Design
items.text: Perfect on every device - phones, tablets, and desktops. Over 70% of web traffic is mobile, so your site needs to look flawless everywhere.

items.title: SEO-Optimized From Day One
items.text: Built with search engine optimization at its core. Your website will rank well on Google and bring in organic traffic automatically.

items.title: Unlimited Edits Forever
items.text: Need changes? No problem. Make unlimited updates and edits to your website content whenever you need - no extra charges, ever.

items.title: Fully Managed & Maintained
items.text: We handle everything: hosting, security, backups, updates, and technical support. You focus on your business, we handle the tech.

items.title: Custom Built For You
items.text: No templates, no shortcuts. Every website is custom-designed and developed specifically for your business and your customers.
